text:
Здравейте, 

 

Може ли в следващата зявка да се добавят едни 1000 евро за депозит по сметка на ТИБИЕЛ в гърция, защото явно сметката е занулена и не могат да си изтеглят таксата от 100 евро и ще помоля отговорните лица да одобрят превода.

 

Благодаря предварително.

 

From: Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com> 
Sent: Thursday, March 7, 2024 11:57 AM
To: Anton Valyov (a.valyov@advice-expert.com) <a.valyov@advice-expert.com>; kirilov.sofia@gmail.com; Vladislav Hristov <v.hristov@nec.bg>; Nikolai Hadzhiysky <n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com>; Gas Trade <Gastrade@tibiel.com>
Subject: Urgent: Deposit Required to Avoid Penalty Fees from Eurobank
Importance: High

 

Dear Team,

 

I received another call from Ms. Loukopoulou at Eurobank today, informing me that the €100 deposit has still not been made. As a result, they are incurring penalty fees from HENEX, which is causing significant problems for them.

 

It's imperative that we make this deposit as soon as possible to prevent any strain on our relationship with Eurobank.

 

Additionally, I propose that we deposit an amount of €500 to fulfill our obligations for the next four months. This proactive step will help us avoid similar issues in the future.

 

Given that we are currently overdue by 7 days, I urge you to prioritize this matter and take immediate action.

 

Best regards,

Thanasis
subject: FW: Urgent: Deposit Required to Avoid Penalty Fees from Eurobank
